title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / People counter
description: The uCIFI people counter provides people counting information using Bluetooth beacon or any other method.. objectID:'3434'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3434:1.1'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.1'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `People counter`.

Actual number of persons.description: Property. Number of persons currently identified by the device.. resourceID:'1'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Daily number of persons.description: Property. Cumulated number of persons detected by the device since beginning of the day.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Cumulated number of persons.description: Property. Cumulated number of persons detected by the device since last reset.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Reset of cumulated number.description: Property. Reset the cumulated number of persons. [Executable resource]. resourceID:'4'. operations:'E'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Daily number of passages.description: Property. Number of passages (same people could be counted multiple times if identified several times) today.. resourceID:'5'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Cumulated number of passages.description: Property. Cumulated number of passages since last reset.. resourceID:'6'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Reset of cumulated number of passages.description: Property. Reset the cumulated number of passages. [Executable resource]. resourceID:'7'. operations:'E'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Type of sensor.description: Property. Type of sensor (e.g. Bluetooth beacon, WIFI detector).. resourceID:'8'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Timestamp.description: Property. The timestamp of when the measurement was performed.. resourceID:'5518'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Fractional Timestamp.description: Property. Fractional part of the timestamp when sub-second precision is used (e.g., 0.23 for 230 ms).. resourceID:'6050'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.

Measurement Quality Indicator.description: Property. Measurement quality indicator reported by a smart sensor. 0: UNCHECKED No quality checks were done because they do not exist or can not be applied. 1: REJECTED WITH CERTAINTY The measured value is invalid. 2: REJECTED WITH PROBABILITY The measured value is likely invalid. 3: ACCEPTED BUT SUSPICIOUS The measured value is likely OK. 4: ACCEPTED The measured value is OK. 5-15: Reserved for future extensions. 16-23: Vendor specific measurement quality.. resourceID:'6042'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Measurement Quality Level.description: Property. Measurement quality level reported by a smart sensor. Quality level 100 means that the measurement has fully passed quality check algorithms. Smaller quality levels mean that quality has decreased and the measurement has only partially passed quality check algorithms. The smaller the quality level, the more caution should be used by the application when using the measurement. When the quality level is 0 it means that the measurement should certainly be rejected.. resourceID:'6049'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
